verses.verse: לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- for the sons קֹ֭רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֑יר <WH7892> Shir; [or] Song יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <WH3248> ye-su-da-To, His foundation בְּהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> be-har-rei- mountains קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> Ko-desh. [is] in the holy

אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> 'o-Hev loveth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> sha-'a-Rei the gates צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon; of Zion מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> mik-Kol, all מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> mish-ke-Not more than all the dwellings יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <WH3513> Nich-ba-dot Glorious things מְדֻבָּ֣ר <WH1696> me-dub-Bar are spoken בָּ֑ךְ Bach; עִ֖יר <WH5892> 'ir of thee O city הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אַזְכִּ֤יר׀ <WH2142> 'az-Kir I will make mention רַ֥הַב <WH7294> Ra-hav of Rahab וּבָבֶ֗ל <WH894> u-va-Vel, and Babylon לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <WH3045> le-Yo-de-'Ai to them that know הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> fe-Le-shet me behold Philistia וְצ֣וֹר <WH6865> ve-Tzor and Tyre עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with כּ֑וּשׁ <WH3568> Kush; with Ethiopia זֶ֝֗ה <WH2088> Zeh, This יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul-lad- this [man] was born שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. But

וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן׀ <WH6726> u-la-tzi-Yon And of Zion יֵאָמַ֗ר <WH559> ye-'a-Mar, it shall be said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish This and that man וְ֭אִישׁ <WH376> Ve-'ish one יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul-lad- was born בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu Himself יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ <WH3559> ye-chon-Ne-ha himself shall establish עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. in her and the highest

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יִ֭סְפֹּר <WH5608> Yis-por shall count בִּכְת֣וֹב <WH3789> bich-Tov when he writeth up עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim; the people זֶ֖ה <WH2088> zeh This יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul-lad- [that] this [man] was born שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham there סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. there Selah

וְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH7891> ve-sha-Rim As well the singers כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <WH2490> ke-cho-le-Lim; as the players כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- All מַעְיָנַ֥י <WH4599> ma'-ya-Nai on instruments [shall be there] all my springs בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
